modName: Mirage Hub - RaceMenu Presets and UUNP BodySlides - DELETED
summary: A hub for Mirage, Vibrant and Majestic RaceMenu presets and their UUNP BodySlides.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://i.imgur.com/X644UFl.jpg[/img][/center][center]"Mirage was born from the breath of Kyne close to Strid River in Valenwood; where vines wither and a waterfall flows into a lost ravine. She was to be watched over until the day came where her destiny would unfold. Many years later, naked and unconscious, she was found below the Shrine of Akatosh by two hunters and brought to Falkreath, where she woke and walked, at the same hour the World Eater took flight on the wave of time once again."




[color=#b6d7a8][b][img]https://i.imgur.com/VUFBZkq.jpg[/img]﻿
- 1.) Pick and Download a Mirage Installer -[/b][/color]
• Mirage RaceMenu Preset
• Majestic Mirage RaceMenu Preset
• Vibrant Mirage RaceMenu Preset


[color=#b6d7a8][b]- 2.) Pick and Download a Mirage Bodyslide -[/b][/color]
• Mirage Plump BodySlide (UUNP)
• Mirage Plump BodySlide (Less Perky Nips) (UUNP)
[color=#b6d7a8][i]* Used by Mirage RaceMenu preset, as shown in her pictures[color=#b6d7a8][i]
* I recommend using this Bodyslide with Mirage, since I tailored her
RaceMenu preset with weight (5) and height (8.2)[/i][/color].
[/i][/color]
Mirage Sleek BodySlide (UUNP)
[color=#b6d7a8][i]* Used by Majestic Mirage RaceMenu preset, as shown in her pictures.
* I recommend using this Bodyslide with Majestic Mirage, since I tailored her
RaceMenu preset with weight (0.11) and height (8.2).[/i][/color]

Mirage Ecstasy BodySlide (UUNP)
[i][color=#b6d7a8][color=#b6d7a8][i]* Used by Vibrant Mirage RaceMenu preset, as shown in her pictures.
* I recommend using this Bodyslide with Vibrant Mirage[color=#b6d7a8][i], since I tailored her
RaceMenu preset with weight ([color=#b6d7a8][i]0.69[/i][/color]) and height (8.2) around this.
[/i][/color][/i][/color][/color][/i]
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#b6d7a8][b]- Mods Required For Preset Compatibility -[/b][/color]
• [Install]: DIMONIZED UNP female body﻿ (or variant).


• [Install]: Fair Skin Complexion (UNP)
[color=#b6d7a8][i]* I use Optimized, but the other UNP one should be fine.
* Use all assets that come with the main file: body textures, brows, eyes, etc.[/i][/color]


• [Install]: SG Female Textures Renewal (UNP) (Main File)
SG Textures UNP Options
[color=#b6d7a8][i]* A.) UNP Textures (Main File)
B.) 2K/4k No Scar Textures (UNP Options)
C.) Smooth Body Textures [color=#b6d7a8][i](UNP Options)

[/i][/color][/i][color=#b6d7a8][color=#ea9999][u]Please Read[/u] - For Majestic Mirage:
Majestic Mirage uses the 2k/4k Scar Textures and Wet Body Textures with Smooth Body Textures,
as shown in her photos.
[u]Installing[/u]:
A.) UNP Textures (Main File)
B.) 2k/4k Scar Textures (UNP Options)
C.) Smooth Body Textures (UNP Options)
D.) Wet Body Textures (UNP Options)[/color][/color][/color]


• [Install]: KS Hairdos Renewal
• [Install]: The Eyes Of Beauty
• [Install]: Brows
• [Install]: Ravens Warpaint (Standalone 11-13)
• [Install]: The Coenaculi


• [Install]: Freckle Mania
[color=#b6d7a8][i]* First version. Could probably use version two.
[/i][/color]
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________

• Set up whatever Mirage BodySlide before clicking the play button, if you want to use one.


[color=#b6d7a8][b]- In-Game -[/b][/color]
• Set your character's race to Breton.
• Load up whatever Mirage RaceMenu preset you picked.




[img]https://i.imgur.com/IH7kKUX.jpg[/img]﻿

[img]https://i.imgur.com/mcgnIKF.jpg[/img]﻿[/center]• Permission is given to use my Mirage RaceMenu presets and Mirage BodySlides for your personal appearance only, well as any screenshots taken of Mirage by me, posted on this page.

• Do NOT create a follower mod of Mirage and upload it to the NexusMods or a third party website. I will do it myself (if time and interest allow), contacting the correct audience to gain permission from creators to use their assets.

• If you would like to use a Mirage BodySlide for a follower of yours, then all I ask is to credit me on your follower's page and link them here to download whatever BodySlide.

• Uploading any Mirage RaceMenu presets or Mirage BodySlides to other avenues is prohibited, well as trying to make any sort of income from it. The Mirage RaceMenu presets and Mirage BodySlides will only exist on NexusMods, Forever Free, as it should be.

• Any imagery with text on it (e.g. banners), shown in the header and on this description page, aren't to be used for your own work — its for this mod page only.
author: Ava Mods
